Name: Average time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and the first occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average duration of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection when followed by SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week compared to when followed directly by SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'

Name: Total time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include at least one SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and SW-Reviewer Declined across all process variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Reviewer Selection is now due in variants containing delays
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to lead to a completed review assignment (i.e., SW-Reviewer Agreed without subsequent decline or unavailability)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection measured until the first successful SW-Reviewer Agreed in multi-attempt reviewer selection paths
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and SW-Reviewer Unavailable in problematic assignment variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable'

Name: Time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in variants that eventually reach this stage
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Average time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and the last reminder activity (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2) before a reviewer agrees
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Initial Reviewer Selection and SW-Reviewer No Response in stalled reviewer assignment paths
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Total time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit in cases where no SW-Reviewer Agreed ever occurs
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'", 'end': "activity == 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit'", 'aggregation': 'total'}"
